actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for the Caesar Creek, Ohio River Basin, Ohio, authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1938.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting to the Chief of Engineers, to construct a water supply system in Ohio. Authorizes appropriations for such system.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for the Caesar Creek, Ohio River Basin, Ohio, authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1938.
